p.k: A riveting 3D journey along 5500 kms of coasts and 3 different seas. From the coast of Belgium to Normandy, from Brittany to the Pyrennees, along the Mediterranean shore and up to Corsica, we discover the most spectacular landscapes, the masterpieces of architecture and landmark monuments but also witness the true diversity of French sea culture. France's coastline shot for the very first time from above in 3D, with a specially developed Hi-Tech equipment.
